description: Validate a single email address with our simple and fast API. Note that this tool does not check deliverability or syntax, and only provides basic validation. In contrast to other tools, this tool is very fast and easy to use. However, it may not provide accurate results for all email addresses. For checking deliverability and syntax, consider using validate_email.validate_email or email_validator._email_validator_validate. For checking complex email addresses, consider using email_checker_and_validator.check_email. By using one of these tools, you can ensure that your email addresses are properly formatted and deliverable. However, for simple email verification tasks, this tool may be sufficient. The following tools are available for more complex tasks: validate_email.validate_email, email_validator._email_validator_validate, and email_checker_and_validator.check_email. Validate_email validates single email or bulk email addresses. Email_validator checks the syntax of an email address and provides friendly error messages. Email_checker_and_validator checks the validity and syntax of an email address.
